mapper.select: SELECT id, title, content, create_time as createTime, update_time as updateTime, user_id as userId, tag, is_top as isTop, is_delete as isDelete, status, channel_id as channelId, img, push, is_comment as isComment, hits, loves, collections, static_link as staticLink, keywords, description, sub_title as subTitle, type, category_id as categoryId, thumnail from content where id=#{id}

SELECT count(1) from content
and channel_id=#{channelId}
and title LIKE '%${keyword}%'
and is_delete LIKE '%${isDelete}%'
mapper.delete: update content set is_delete=2 where id=#{id}
